page.title: 07AGRICULTURE I
page.content:
This subject gives you a few facts and figures on what goes on in farming around this area.
CROPS The main kinds of crops that farmers plant are grass and barley. You could call hay and silage grass in some ways because they both start off as grass. Wheat,turnips and potatoes are also quite common.Lots of people have turnips to keep their sheep on,quite a lot of people have potatoes and sell some of them. Carrots are not really all that common but some people do grow them. Out of all the farmers that we surveyed,40% of them used all their crops at home, 20% sent them all away,and 40% did both.
